title: Lewis Capaldi celebrates US number one in the most wholesome way
text:
How else are you meant to celebrate? (Picture: Lewis Capaldi/Twitter)

Lewis Capaldi celebrated getting a number one in the US in the most Lewis Capaldi way possible.

The 23-year-old singer’s Someone You Loved rose up the charts to number one in the states and Lewis used the exciting opportunity to become America’s sweetheart.

No, seriously.

The star toasted the occasion by painting his face with the American flag and popping open champagne bottles.

That’s not big enough of a celebration, is it?

He donned a ‘Lewis Capaldi – America’s Sweetheart’ t-shirt that had his infamous towel-wrapped-head selfie across the chest.

Lewis even changed his Twitter handle to America’s Sweetheart because you’ve got to let the people know exactly who you are.

The American Dream (Picture: @LewisCapaldi/Instagram)

Where do we get this shirt? (Picture: @LewisCapaldi/Instagram)

The hit song making the Billboard Hot 100 in the States makes him the first UK artist to top the US charts with a single from a debut album since Leona Lewis’ Bleeding Love in 2008.

That’s it, everyone. Next one will be in another ten years.

Meanwhile, singer Yungblud has recently revealed that he used to be flatmates with Lewis – and they would ‘cause so much trouble’ as they got ‘drunk five nights a week’.

The rising 22-year-old rocker has admitted to becoming very good pals with the Hold Me While You Wait singer while the two were searching for a record deal.

‘Lewis was here in London trying to get signed like me,’ Yungblud told The Sun. ‘No one wanted to f***ing know, so we’d just be getting drunk five nights a week. We caused so much trouble.’

And Yungblud – real name Dominic Harrison – added that he and Lewis still keep in contact to this day, as they wondered how they had come so far in their careers.

‘We still keep in contact. We were in America together and we were like, “What the f*** is going on?”,’ he said.

‘Now we’re like sat in Soho House saying, “How the f*** did we get here?”’
